name: course_registration_system
description: The University Course Registration System is a modern web-based solution designed to eliminate the frustrations of outdated registration platforms. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and a dynamic front-end, this system provides real-time scheduling, seat availability tracking, and an intuitive filtering system to help students plan their courses efficiently. Admins can manage courses, adjust seat allocations, and generate reports with ease. Featuring a single-page application (SPA) approach, the system ensures a smooth, interactive experience without unnecessary page refreshes. Bonus features include subscription-based seat availability notifications and GitHub integration for version control and documentation.
author: gellahi
